name: age
definition: age of the participant in years

name: gender
definition: gender of the participant (1 = female, 2 = male, 3 = other)

name: climate_believer
definition: Whether the participant believes in humanmade climate change or not (believer, denier)

name: climate_risk
definition: How much risk is associated with climate change (0 = none - 10 = extreme)

name: dem_rep
definition: Political affiliation of the respondent (1 = democrat - 6 = republican)

name: condition
definition: Which condition the participant was assigned to (0 = control; 1 = experimental manipulation)

name: mean_agree
definition: Mean score of how much the participant agrees with the arguments from a scale 0 (not agreeing) - 100 (agreeing).

name: consistency
definition: Consistency means whether the presented argument is consistent with the participants affiliation. Pro climate change argument is consistent with climate believer, while climate change denial is consistent with climate denier affiliation.

name: science_sum
definition: Measure of belief in science in general.
